Name: Enter Prologue
Desc: The mission to take back the Earth begins now. —Hassen

Name: Prologue 01
Desc: Lave the rest to me.

Name: Prologue 02
Desc: With Immune Serum and pain receptors disconnected, we can continue to execute our mission.

Name: Prologue 03
Desc: Open your eyes and see the humans for who they really are through this person. I look forward to your choice after learning about the truth...

Name: A Brief Transit
Desc: To ensure the victory in the War Zone, Gray Raven decided to head further into the zone.

Name: Farewell Gift
Desc: Lucia can fight again thanks to the Construct's arm.

Name: Graffiti Blast
Desc: Traces of graffiti. Facing such eerie artwork, Liv decided to join the battle.

Name: Full Strength
Desc: Try to fight with Liv!

Name: Restoring Scene
Desc: In the simulation replay, all Gray Raven saw were the Corrupted feasting on their comrades...

Name: Lost in Mist
Desc: Artistic creations?

Name: A Soft Heart
Desc: Lucia turns silent for a short while after receiving the plushie, staring at it with an unmoving gaze.

Name: The Purpose
Desc: If you're lost, then simply walk forward. Walking forward itself can be meaningful enough.

Name: The Followers
Desc: These graffiti surprisingly captivated a lot of these Corrupted...

Name: Base Color
Desc: Hehe... this is just... for a little... base coloring...

Name: Self Analysis
Desc: I... am a free machine.

Name: Final Work
Desc: Be cursed... by... my... work...!

Name: A Strange New Friend
Desc: Indeed... Walking the path of heavens... The Construct who will rule everything... My name is... Nanami!

Name: Strange Signal
Desc: This signal... The Construct's named "Tifa"?

Name: Old Acquaintance
Desc: This is the leader of the Cerberus squad.

Name: Relic
Desc: No, I remember now... Yes, this reeks of her, we've been played.

Name: Language Game
Desc: This Inver-Device... Tifa took it off herself.

Name: Will to Survive
Desc: That's a... survivor from the Suzaku squad!

Name: Iso-Device
Desc: Corrupted gained new abilities by corrupting the Iso-Devices.

Name: Rescue Signal
Desc: The team received a signal from a Construct requesting aid. Help him as soon as possible.

Name: Will of Steel
Desc: Wait for me, Tifa... I'll... bring you back to... Babylonia...

Name: A "Safe" Exit
Desc: This is the last area linking to the Portal. A safe route can be set up here only.

Name: The Proud
Desc: What a fool. With Ascendant's power, I will fulfill the last wish of my commandant...

Name: End of Torture
Desc: —and shot a bullet into her point-blank.

Name: Seeds
Desc: Among those hypocritical and disorganized humans, I'll find an appropriate... one to be the... seed...

Name: Terminal
Desc: This is the Museum Estate. The Ascendant traces ended here.

Name: Driven by Instinct
Desc: A colossal blade whirls past—Then I'm going in! Hiya—

Name: Good Samaritan
Desc: Helping people makes me feel good!

Name: Trespassing
Desc: Even though we encountered a little trouble, we managed to get into the Estate.

Name: Traps
Desc: What secrets is the Estate hiding? And what exactly is the inheritance?

Name: Final Warning
Desc: That must be the Ascendant.

Name: Take Caution
Desc: A new variant, along with many Corrupted reinforcements, suddenly appeared in the Estate. Pass through this courtyard ASAP.

Name: Special Mission
Desc: Only Lucia can soundlessly destroy enemies.

Name: Twisted Modification
Desc: We'd better be mentally prepared for... whatever's coming.

Name: Each Loyal to Their Own
Desc: I thought you were... a good guy.

Name: A New Seed
Desc: Is that what you think... Did you not notice that my target was you from the start?

Name: Night Escape
Desc: After Kamui regains consciousness, the remaining task for Gray Raven is how to escape from here.

Name: Deduction
Desc: The calculation result is... there are no routes...

Name: Beneficiary
Desc: Take cover! Baby's gonna blow!

Name: Breaking Through
Desc: The heavy agriculture machine falls to the ground with a thud, its speaker keeps repeating something, as if calling out for someone.

Name: Lurking Sand
Desc: There's Punishing Virus reaction beneath the sand!

Name: Panic Dive
Desc: Vassago, a kind of aggressive bionic Sand Worm.

Name: Forsaken
Desc: Identity... deserter?

Name: Negotiation
Desc: Next time we meet, we'll be enemies.

Name: Left Behind
Desc: When Gray Raven almost escaped, Liv was captured by the Forsaken.

Name: Kidnapping
Desc: You kidnapped me. For this, you face the risk of warfare with Babylonia.

Name: Noises
Desc: In order to take Liv back, Gray Raven decided to split up.

Name: Bloody Truth
Desc: That gift—the box of wild mint.

Name: Traces
Desc: Without Liv, Gray Raven can only stay in place and wait for Kamui's results.

Name: Blind Fight
Desc: This doesn't look like a biosphere... It's more like the... M.I.N.D.

Name: Dispelling Illusions
Desc: As the Gray Raven has figured out how the EM projectors function, it is time to find and disable them.

Name: A Smart Path
Desc: This is a souvenir Murray gave me, a mini graviton detector.

Name: True Form
Desc: As turning the devices off by hand is too inefficient, Lucia has proposed adopting Strike Hawk's method.

Name: Suppressed Illusions
Desc: With my help, projector breaking's gonna be twice as fast!

Name: Humanoid
Desc: The Corrupted are doing an organized retreat suddenly. Gray Raven has realized that they might be controlled by someone else.

Name: Supervisor
Desc: Who do these imprisoned consciousnesses in the M.I.N.D. Test Area belong to?

Name: The Light of Seven
Desc: It's a friendly signal. Did support come?

Name: Lost Sword
Desc: Gray Raven found the Forsakens and Liv deep inside the M.I.N.D. Test Area.

Name: Turning the Table
Desc: Watanabe, I need an explanation...!

Name: Liv's Return
Desc: Connect to Liv's M.I.N.D., Commandant. Only you can save her now.

Name: Tracking the Ascendant
Desc: After resting in a Forsaken camp for a night, Gray Raven has received a new mission from Babylonia.

Name: Deep Under
Desc: Gray Raven has to go toward City 019 around 30km away.

Name: Mystery
Desc: These are the marks of resistance from the people.

Name: Powerful Reinforcement
Desc: Nanami suddenly appeared to join the battle of Gray Raven and the new type of Corrupted.

Name: Mind Noises
Desc: The further Gray Raven goes, the higher the concentration of Punishing Virus. At this time, Liv found something abnormal on one of the members.

Name: Parting Ways
Desc: Kamui suddenly left without a single explanation.

Name: Greater Threats
Desc: Please decide quickly. Some of the Corrupted on the production line have awakened.

Name: Detonation
Desc: ...Nanami, I order you to help Watanabe!

Name: Cleansing
Desc: De... tecting... thermal... reaction... purify...

Name: Retreat
Desc: Lead everyone out after the detonation.

Name: Cerberus
Desc: Kamui, when were you first corrupted?

Name: Purifying Force
Desc: Right before the Purifying Force executed the mission, Strike Hawk had connected in.

Name: Left Behind
Desc: The leader of Strike Hawk had made up his mind to save Kamui. In order to break the deadlock, Bianca was willing to make temporary concessions and help to find Kamui in the ruins.

Name: Buried Alive
Desc: Gray Raven encountered a group of aggressive Corrupted under the ground.

Name: Restructure
Desc: Gray Raven has returned to the entrance because of the Corrupted's interference. They have to map the best route ahead.

Name: Unexpected Alliance
Desc: He's Rohacchi, Nanami's pal!

Name: Split
Desc: Without a trace of Kamui, Karenina quietly left the team.

Name: Tracking
Desc: She's going after Kamui on her own.

Name: Encounter
Desc: Traces of battle between Karenina and Kamui can be found on the way following the tracks of Karenina.

Name: Abnormal Energy
Desc: When Gray Raven found Karenina, she had already lost consciousness. Liv found abnormal energy inside her... same as the one inside Kamui.

Name: Boiling Consciousness
Desc: A form of energy is trying to invade Karen's M.I.N.D.

Name: Besieged
Desc: The enemies were coming at Gray Raven once Karenina's condition was stabilized. Seeing that they moved in coordination, there must be someone behind them.

Name: Two Frontlines
Desc: We meet again, Babylonians.

Name: End of the Path
Desc: Defeat the Ascendant first!

Name: Dawn
Desc: With the authority of the Babylonian Council, I order the Gray Raven squad to withdraw immediately!

Name: Potential Unlocked
Desc: With the "help" of the president, Gray Raven have obtained supplies and continued on their way.

Name: Obstacle
Desc: The situation has been getting worse. Gray Raven decided to sneak in with a special method.

Name: Clone
Desc: Deep inside the ruins, Gray Raven encountered Nozzle, the robot that should have already been retrieved.

Name: Weeping Rose
Desc: After Nozzle is the robot butler of the same model as the butler back in the Estate. It seems that "someone" does not want Gray Raven to find Kamui.

Name: Path of Torture
Desc: It proved that those Corrupted were made by Roland through some unknown means. Suddenly, Lee left the team just like Kamui had done.

Name: Remnants
Desc: Lee's not responding to my connection, something's wrong.

Name: Trial of Torture
Desc: You'll pay for this.

Name: Justice
Desc: How'd you guarantee that it ain't a monster coming out of that tin can?

Name: Resistance
Desc: I'll never be strayed by anything, I'll only follow my own will. I have not lost yet!

Name: Devoured
Desc: I did it with my will and fought so from the beginning till now!

Name: Light and Shadow
Desc: Because, you are me, and I am you. We're both Kamui.

Name: Flying Sand
Desc: This war will likely determine the future direction of the world.

Name: Second Contact
Desc: A friendly reminder from Korolev: Dear children, please treat public facilities with love and care—

Name: Star Rift
Desc: The contents of the signal... were lines from a play... Shakespeare's "The Tempest".

Name: Reunion
Desc: At least for now, we're using each other.

Name: Self Immune
Desc: Cells infected by bacteria or viruses will be... destroyed and discarded...

Name: Digit Blade
Desc: If there is any danger, Commandant, please wake us immediately.

Name: Strict Education
Desc: This high-density body plans to give Gray Raven a lesson.

Name: Gravitational Edge
Desc: The Prism is now ready.

Name: Instant Communication
Desc: Selena said something related to the... design of these rings.

Name: Hetero-Core
Desc: Coated man. Floating Cube.

Name: Set
Desc: The cross ahead is named the Punishing Heteromer.

Name: Shatter
Desc: We had a discussion and decided that I would be the best candidate to fire the Prism.

Name: Chase
Desc: Watanabe turns and runs toward the gravity room's exit.

Name: Pray
Desc: The folks prayed to a certain being that they would find peace at the end of their journeys.

Name: To Akdilek
Desc: Akdilek Commercial Alliance... Wait, this diagram, is a train?

Name: Constructs on Earth
Desc: Are you surprised? Construct Tech is not something only Babylonia has.

Name: A Trade with Akdilek
Desc: After all, that is our most valuable merchandise.

Name: Choice
Desc: We can't afford to wait any longer.

Name: Omen
Desc: Golden Apple System, activate!

Name: Someone and Bianca
Desc: Aww, you're not using the motorcycle I especially prepared for you? And it's a really cool design too...

Name: Powerless
Desc: I don't plan to abandon any one of you... It is not my intention for anyone to get hurt.

Name: Hitchhike
Desc: There's no use in finding the culprit now... Let's find the way to the carriage.

Name: Gunners
Desc: As expected, Sophia has figured out the "satisfying" answer in her heart.

Name: Resolve
Desc: I can be a good merchant too!

Name: From Now On
Desc: The Eternal Engine got back on track after destroying the "goods".

Name: Eternity
Desc: Fate never favors anyone... There is no eternity, Aston.

Name: Delivery
Desc: I have confirmed the status of the "goods". Are you ready for delivery?

Name: Port
Desc: The Nighter. The oriental ship that only pulls in at night.

Name: Night Voyage
Desc: Looks like you're in big trouble, Gray Raven.

Name: Escape Room
Desc: The familiar ceiling doesn't come to sight when opening eyes. It is a locked secret chamber and there is an unusual sign of connection.

Name: Port
Desc: The only related text was about "Opera", an art form that existed in the pre-pandemic human world.

Name: Night Market
Desc: Canned pupa! Three grubs a can!

Name: Closure
Desc: Who kidnapped the commandant? The answer might be hidden on the ship that left the port.

Name: Cargo
Desc: No, that thing's called "Huaxu".

Name: Control
Desc: Lucia, you look great in this outfit!

Name: Entry
Desc: The audience feasts their eyes on this pair of embodiments of oriental beauty.

Name: The Fool
Desc: And how can you be so sure? Machines are merely lifeless creations of mankind, devoid of emotions and thoughts.

Name: Who Dreams
Desc: With Lucia as the vessel, Huaxu will become the perfect existence.

Name: Freedom
Desc: I don't understand love. I am the one who deprived you of your freedom, who always controlled you...

Name: Kowloong
Desc: The ship drifts. Everyone trains their sights upon the sea's surface, an azure painting glittering under the morning sun.

Name: Unknown Future
Desc: The team is preparing for the experiment of a new frame in Babylonia while discussing the future directions.

Name: Thorough Preparation
Desc: Apart from the new frame, Asimov is also preparing another secret weapon for Nikola.

Name: Catcher in the Rye
Desc: The Ascendants gather together and prepare to head toward the battle that will decide their fate.

Name: Mist
Desc: After a seemingly endless wait, the Nighter was finally coming ashore.

Name: Rejection
Desc: The crew weren't welcomed, but rejected instead.

Name: Gathering
Desc: The real Huaxu must not fall into the hands of Ascendants. Babylonia forces started gathering.

Name: Break the Ice
Desc: In the arctic land, the fisher was urging the sailor to hurry. Forest Guards were chasing after the Corrupted.

Name: Chaos
Desc: Everybody had their own plan. Except Babylonia.

Name: Hawk & Hound
Desc: The joint operation between Cerberus and Strike Hawk didn't seem to be going well.

Name: War Decision
Desc: The actions taken by different parties only further accelerated the war.

Name: Frankenstein
Desc: It was complete mayhem in Kowloong City. They seemed to have underestimated the Ascendants.

Name: Smile
Desc: War was imminent. Gray Raven made a promise.

Name: Support Force
Desc: Never underestimate the Support Force! —Bridget

Name: Sister
Desc: The two Lucias met again in Kowloong City.

Name: Accumulation
Desc: Seriously wounded, Lucia was removed from the frontline for recovery, while Gray Raven received an unexpected reinforcement.

Name: Ticket
Desc: Two leaders were having a conversation in a station.

Name: Lamia's Poison
Desc: As an Ascendant, Lamia specialized in manipulating her enemies.

Name: Corporation
Desc: Qu decided to take one step further for the Corporation.

Name: Hawk Hunt
Desc: In order to rescue fellow comrades, Strike Hawk was forced to confront Lamia.

Name: Mermaid of Hatred
Desc: Strike Hawk's effort wasn't wasted. Kowloong guards decided to join forces against Lamia.

Name: Shield
Desc: Lucia was already on her way, so Strike Hawk decided to first create a path.

Name: Crisis
Desc: A golden powder was seen on the battlefield between Cerberus and Roland.

Name: Onboard Entertainment
Desc: The train was getting close to Kowloong—

Name: Promise
Desc: Far away from the battle, Lucia woke up—

Name: Inside the Light Wall
Desc: Gray Raven managed to get through the light wall, only to be greeted by Kowloong's defense force.

Name: At the Door
Desc: There were also different opinions within the light wall. What would happen...?

Name: The Warden
Desc: Gray Raven met Qu in the tower and discovered Kowloong's real intention.

Name: Plume
Desc: On the Observatory Plume shone bright.

Name: Hope
Desc: It was over... For now.

Name: Patched Memories
Desc: Start by... collecting Nozzle's memory chips, right?

Name: Hello World
Desc: This world... what happened to it...

Name: Initial Inspiration
Desc: This way... he will... understand me...

Name: Into the M.I.N.D.
Desc: Liv connects herself to the tattered remains of Tifa—

Name: Dark Struggle
Desc: I... my body...

Name: New Masterpiece
Desc: Tifa gazed at the mechanic head with an enchanted expression... "Hah, what a piece of work"...

Name: Collapsed Bridge
Desc: Tifa ignores Kamui, and leaves before the bridge collapsed entirely.

Name: Arrival
Desc: Hm. Finally. My stop.

Name: Vintage Taste
Desc: Then I'll help myself.

Name: Enjoyment
Desc: You seem to be enjoying yourself a little too much.

Name: Smiling Devil
Desc: Ascendant trails extended all the way here!

Name: Taming
Desc: You might still be useful.

Name: Zack Activated
Desc: Try to restore Zack's iconic memories, if possible...

Name: Ruthlessness
Desc: Zack, do you think the rabbit's right? Or the donkey's right?

Name: Her
Desc: Wait... Miss Emma's signal appeared in the courtyard...

Name: Protection
Desc: The enemy... is strong... Stronger than... Zack...

Name: Emma
Desc: Aren't they coming with us?

Name: Farewell
Desc: The last plane leaves the inner garden.

Name: Destination
Desc: This is a M.I.N.D. testing site from the old world. We'll have to reach the core area of this building.

Name: Tracing
Desc: Watanabe confessed to Liv that the Forsaken needed her power for one thing.

Name: Split Road
Desc: Just a little more and...

Name: Brawling
Desc: Liv, hold on! We'll... find a way to...

Name: Lost
Desc: Only if she could find her way back to her M.I.N.D.

Name: Swallowed
Desc: The pseudo-consciousness of Liv reforms itself, and attempts to close off the M.I.N.D. entrance...!

Name: Sister
Desc: Because machines would never waver in their faith, they proved more reliable than any normal human believer.

Name: Child
Desc: But have you ever seen this many plump and well-fed kids queuing up?

Name: Dismemberment
Desc: Tch, stingy old hag...

Name: Blade
Desc: A pair of bladed wings spread out of her back. She leaps and dives into the Corrupted-filled abyss down below.

Name: Against the Current
Desc: Well, I'm not going back anyway. Might as well play a little with this power.

Name: Ending
Desc: Serving God and humans as a machine for my entire life, was there even any meaning to this?

Name: Recurrence
Desc: This is Rohacchi's memory data I copied from the ruins. Now rendering it into visual data for replay.

Name: Defense
Desc: The visual data shows that Rohacchi clashed with the Ascendant.

Name: Kindred
Desc: When Rohacchi was escaping, it has sensed its "companions".

Name: Friends
Desc: Friends! From now on Rohacchi and Nanami will be good friends!

Name: Treasure Hunt
Desc: Looks like Rohacchi's awakening has something to do with that mysterious mural.

Name: Fantasy
Desc: In the end, we couldn't find any relevant information about the murals...

Name: Report
Desc: Chrome, too... He knows full well I'm not familiar with these things.

Name: Retrospective Memory
Desc: I went deeper into the ruins.

Name: Dark Pursuit
Desc: Camu said that those Corrupted were originally after me.

Name: Relentless
Desc: Can you believe this? Beneath the ruins so deep underground, is another big and spacious... space!

Name: Doppelg?nger
Desc: Almost there.

Name: Unity
Desc: Goodnight, the other me.

Name: Reply Signal
Desc: Ayla inhaled a deep breath and started to focus, trying to sense any possible signal from Selena.

Name: Assist
Desc: There is where Selena failed.

Name: Lose Again
Desc: The carcass suddenly jerks, as if she had felt Ayla.

Name: Threat
Desc: Heads up, the Corrupted are invading!

Name: Spider
Desc: Hetero activity detected... It's similar to the egg hatching process of an arthropod.

Name: Obstacles
Desc: Enemies have been swarming towards Changyu on the train roof. Sophia decided to split up from Gray Raven in the nick of time.

Name: Return
Desc: While you, on the other hand, rest.

Name: Deviate
Desc: Changyu's situation is a bit dire and requires emergency maintenance.

Name: Decision
Desc: The parts of the external mechanic arms can be replaced with the mechanical equipment lying around.

Name: Entry
Desc: "Don't worry, I'm Executive Officer Nikola's agent."

Name: Disguise
Desc: Don't move. First, let's fit your head through this hole in the dress...

Name: Mesmerized
Desc: They're all trapped in this place, yet they're excited as ever for this event. Are they controlled too deep—or are they poisoned by this dream?

Name: Confusion
Desc: Two similar yet vastly different souls sit together, back to back, seeing entirely different worlds.

Name: Diminishing
Desc: The dream wasn't good enough. That's all.

Name: Trojan Horse
Desc: The Forest Guards followed the Corrupted to Kowloong City.

Name: Trapped Hound
Desc: Who was the real prey? Cerberus, or Roland?

Name: Gold & Centaur
Desc: "I want you to join us in this battle, Rosetta."

Name: Fireworks
Desc: Finally, it was time for Cerberus to strike back.

Name: Deceptor
Desc: Lamia owed Watanabe a favor.

Name: Another Ending
Desc: The war was coming to an end. Everybody had their own thoughts and plans.

Name: Seize
Desc: Gabriel's giant arm pierced through Qu's chest...

Name: Struggle
Desc: I promised Mother and Father that I would never let anyone hurt you. So, I'll take the risks...

Name: Trespassers
Desc: Where did these two little girls come from...?

Name: Warm Food
Desc: Sister, are we finally safe?

Name: Frog Plushie
Desc: Blame your own naivety.

Name: Price of Naivety
Desc: We don't have a choice...

Name: Lingering Warmth
Desc: Lucia held Luna in her arms. They fell asleep together for the last time in the cold room...

Name: Star in the Dark
Desc: Only at the end of a long darkness you will find happiness. And we are no different.

Name: Undying
Desc: Her black long hair, along with a few tags in her clenched fist, are the only things swaying in the warm wind...

Name: Separated
Desc: That's why I need her... to stay loyal to humanity.

Name: Falling
Desc: Alright. Now is the time... to welcome another lady home.

Name: Reunion
Desc: It's impossible! The goddamned Corrupted... and Punishing Virus!

Name: Escape
Desc: Lucia barely held on to her blade as she stumbled across the city.

Name: Tears
Desc: Lucia almost collapsed into Luna's arms. Tears ran down her cheeks.

Name: The First Sight
Desc: I want to meet her.

Name: Your Name
Desc: This was how I met that person.

Name: Vague Emotions
Desc: I learned many things from Commandant...

Name: Gray Raven
Desc: Lee, Liv, myself, and Commandant. We are Gray Raven.

Name: α
Desc: Sometimes... I had flashback of memories of Lucia.

Name: Twin Blades of Will
Desc: I felt sorry for everything. That's why I must keep moving on.

Name: Determination
Desc: Be my blade, Plume.

Name: Cherished Memory
Desc: It was a conversation with Commandant, hidden deep in my heart.

Name: Uninvited Guest
Desc: I'm sure we can get along, right?

Name: Out of Place
Desc: Live, can you find that white dress for your sister? I'm sure you can do such an easy task, right?

Name: Honor
Desc: ...I can stay back and take care of our home.

Name: Collapsed Pride
Desc: Let me go to the war zone. Please.

Name: To a New World
Desc: Aren't you going to... have a few words with her?

Name: Flower on Battlefield
Desc: Please answer my question.

Name: White Dress
Desc: Get changed, Liv... At least, you should leave beautifully. You can do it... I'm sure.

Name: XX Month/XX Day, Sunny
Desc: Nanami's got a diary book today!

Name: Day XX, Expectation
Desc: Nanami will live happily ever after. Just like daddy and mommy...

Name: Day XX, Fissure
Desc: Everybody has stopped going to class. Daddy and mommy also stayed home.

Name: Day XX, Decision
Desc: I... must... fight...

Name: Day XX, Anomaly
Desc: Why are there... machines... in Nanami's arm?

Name: Day XX, Truth
Desc: We have lied to you...

Name: Day XX, A New Journey
Desc: From now on, Nanami's alone...

Name: Pulse Strike
Desc: Make sure you wait for Nanami! I'll be back!

Name: Barren Land
Desc: Even scavengers cannot survive on this barren land.

Name: Between Friends
Desc: We are friends. Always are!

Name: Hunting Ground
Desc: A scavenger had witnessed some Construct in the hunting ground.

Name: Born as Human
Desc: All this attacking and robbing... Are we really that different from the Corrupted?

Name: Beyond Friendship
Desc: Tell her that we are thankful... and sorry.

Name: Secret of the Hunting Ground
Desc: I... still don't really understand what it means to live, but well, I'm not human to start with.

Name: Core Parts
Desc: You can have this robot on your birthday, Murray.

Name: At What Cost
Desc: I don't care what I do, or what price I pay... As long as Murray can stay alive.

Name: Thug in a Suit
Desc: Just some simple modifications. 30 seconds are more than enough.

Name: Little Robot
Desc: When Murray's not around... This robot can stay with you, brother...

Name: Robotic Heart
Desc: Leave all the risk to me.

Name: So Close, Yet So Far
Desc: You'll be fine. Everything will be fine.

Name: Binary - Assemble
Desc: That dancing robot is still incomplete.

Name: Sand Pit
Desc: The sand pit is the children's favorite playground. But to some, it could be a place of malice.

Name: Crazy Old Nutter and Little Dummy
Desc: They say you are crazy, but you are the only one who has cared for me.

Name: Hidden in Danger
Desc: Remorse is just another form of craziness. Truth lies in danger.

Name: Stolen Hope
Desc: The kids laughed as they took away her treasure. No one noticed the hatred in her eyes.

Name: Light Lost
Desc: A sudden blackout put everybody in panic.

Name: The Punishment
Desc: If someone must be punished, I'll be the one and only.

Name: Spiral of Causality
Desc: Be it known or unknown, the spiral of causality never stops.

Name: Physical Training
Desc: We're used to it, but what's the point in it?

Name: Imagine the Future
Desc: Money and survival, that's what humans live for.

Name: Snow Rescue
Desc: Oasis, Bruce, Watanabe, prepare to move out. Our mission, search and rescue.

Name: Don't Stop
Desc: Don't mourn the dead with sorrow, Watanabe.

Name: Saving Hope
Desc: No matter how hopeless, as long as I can save someone...

Name: Who's the First
Desc: I can't always let that brave soldier be ahead of me...

Name: Oasis Squad
Desc: Oasis will be under my leadership starting from today! That is Bruce's... last order!

Name: Retreat
Desc: Before the shuttle successfully lands on Babylonia, the torch of humanity is in your hands.

Name: Reminisce
Desc: Bruce and I are different. If you could spend more time with him, I'm sure you will be proud of him.

Name: Infiltrate the Airport
Desc: I'll leave my back to you then, Captain Cyril!

Name: Ambush
Desc: Command Center! Why are there missile attacks?!

Name: Standoff
Desc: I will continue to fight on Earth, for Bruce!

Name: Final Choice
Desc: Watanabe, I thank you for your service to humanity on behalf of Babylonia.

Name: Finding Oasis
Desc: He hobbled across the scorching desert in search of "Oasis".

Name: May We Be Blessed
Desc: Someone will soon come here and take us to a safe place.

Name: Forgotten Church
Desc: More and more people are coming to Snow Plain Church in this arctic land.

Name: Prayer & Faith
Desc: I'm willing to give everything... even my life.

Name: To the Light
Desc: Take them to somewhere safe before the blizzard comes again.

Name: Protection & Judgement
Desc: Be prepared to atone for your sins, for I shall be your judgement!

Name: Snowfall
Desc: Follow your heart, my child.

Name: Losing Myself
Desc: God, if I ever lose myself, I am willing to accept any judgement and punishment.

Name: Lily
Desc: Toby holds out the supply pack to Bianca, and on top of the pack lies a single white lily.

Name: Bold Request
Desc: The quiet of the night is shattered by a series of footsteps reverberating through the empty corridor.

Name: Daedalus
Desc: Allow me to introduce myself. I'm Wen, chairman of Daedalus Security Company.

Name: Dreams
Desc: Keep it up. I'm sure you'll make your dreams come true before long.

Name: The Truth
Desc: When the warehouse was lit up, what came into Bianca's sight, instead of the company's goods, were the Constructs restrained by the restraint devices.

Name: The Ending
Desc: It's all over. Time to take a break...

Name: Invite
Desc: I took lots of wrong paths when I was your age, but those experiences have made me who I am.

Name: Chit-Chat
Desc: Large-scale missions are always exciting.

Name: First Team
Desc: The first team of Task Force is the most powerful.

Name: Battle-Type Construct
Desc: They always fight relentlessly, as if fighting is the sole reason for them to exist.

Name: Large-scale Extermination Mission
Desc: This is a large scale mission to eliminate Corrupted.

Name: Dilemma
Desc: During the battle, Constructs have received orders... But every single order is different.

Name: Sparks of Farewell
Desc: Among liquid and parts, the sparks bid farewell to a friend under the setting sun.

Name: Dark Side
Desc: Shh. You don't have to be afraid. No need to know who I am either... For you will eventually become me.

Name: Colors
Desc: Meka announced the travel plans to the painting Ayla. Ayla was very excited.

Name: The Beginning
Desc: Among the frolicking children, an ancient story is going to be reenacted by inhuman creatures.

Name: Friends
Desc: Ayla made a friend because of "Thunderstorm".

Name: The Letter
Desc: Ayla received unexpected news as she was preparing for her exhibition.

Name: A Gift
Desc: Ayla received a "gift" from Selena, causing minor changes in her mood.

Name: Farewell
Desc: Ayla is determined to set off on her journey, leaving behind an unfinished painting.

Name: The Other
Desc: What was Selena feeling when she was surrounded by the Corrupted?

Name: Hyena
Desc: Risking her life to steal food rations, a shelter that could have been broken through at any moment... It was the world in the eyes of a girl named "Hyena".

Name: Wrench
Desc: A burst of noise outside the shelter drew Hyena's attention. Maybe today would be a little bit different?

Name: Sophia
Desc: "Hyena" was no longer "Hyena". She became soft-hearted and adorable, all because of the... "family".

Name: Catastrophe
Desc: Within a mere few hours, everyone's fate would be changed completely. Most of them would not be able to see the sunrise again.

Name: Sworn Enemy
Desc: The letter indicated the direction of hatred, but was it really that simple?

Name: The Truth
Desc: The truth changed everything.

Name: When the Day Comes
Desc: A letter with Akdilek's wax seal lay on President Hassen's desk...

Name: No.1
Desc: Tsk, why is he getting all the benefits?

Name: Dialogue
Desc: A smart person knows when to do what. Focus on the moment and plan for the future.

Name: Connection
Desc: Please break the memory connection immediately. If you exceed your connection threshold, memory loss may occur!

Name: Proud Work
Desc: You have perfect Tantalum-193 heteropolymer adaptability and beautiful biological readings. Looks like we have a high chance of success.

Name: Available Resource
Desc: Whether you are the weapon or the user, once you are on the battlefield, you share the same fate.

Name: Leader
Desc: Hurry up, Leader! Let's go together.

Name: Scar
Desc: A warrior fears not wounds nor bleeding.

Name: The Redheaded Death
Desc: "Isn't she... the Redheaded Death?"

Name: Construct - Vera
Desc: At the medic station, Vera raised her hand with determination to fight at the front lines.

Name: Evacuation
Desc: The battlefield was not as good as Vera had thought. Her squad was eliminated as expected.

Name: Shrouded in Darkness
Desc: Vera was locked in the detention room for the fighting with the Constructs calling her the death.

Name: Embrace the Pain
Desc: Instead of following the orders, Vera decided to do what her heart said—protect the city at all cost.

Name: Among the Agonies
Desc: Vera and other soldiers were overwhelmed by the Corrupted. She painfully realized what she should do now.

Name: File: Iron Maiden
Desc: Taking away Tifa's pain was all Vera could do for her.

Name: The Eve
Desc: Like his master said, Camu accepted the serum injection and became a Kurono soldier.

Name: Soldier
Desc: Camu and his companions were dispatched to the mobile fleet. During their missions, they realized how cruel the world was.

Name: Pact
Desc: The serum did not stop a soldier from dying. Camu discovered something when he delivered the goods to Kurono.

Name: Incinerate
Desc: What had to be burned down was not only the city occupied by the Corrupted, but also the "Corrupted" themselves.

Name: Crawling
Desc: Grasping their weapons with rage, Camu and his companions marched to Kurono's base.

Name: Avengers
Desc: This was a battle between the Constructs and the Corrupted. Surrounded by blazing flames, everything fell into darkness.

Name: Kamui
Desc: "I'd like to see how you live through this world, Kamui."

Name: Cottie
Desc: The leader of the mysterious organization only briefly existed in history. What's the true identity of this Memory?

Name: Einsteina
Desc: As the renowned "brain" of the mysterious organization, Dr. Einsteina, the legendary Memory, has a secret side.

Name: Becky
Desc: She's the No.3 database of the mysterious organization. Will anyone ever witness her power?

Name: Condelina
Desc: According to the record, this Memory is able to utilize sounds to manipulate people's minds. Will Gray Raven be able to resist the temptation?

Name: Athmail
Desc: She's the greatest weapon of the Syndicute. What will her power be...?

Name: Guinevere
Desc: A girl once lost her life in the pursuit of love. What Memory did she leave behind?

Name: Heisen
Desc: As the No.1 mad scientist of the Syndicute, she had stepped into the realm of death beyond any sanity. Yet, she faced a cruel future.

Name: Shakespeare
Desc: Gray Raven was looking forward to someone normal... This time, it's the hymn of emotions.

Name: Catherine
Desc: This is dedicated to you, my beloved rose garden.

Name: Aife
Desc: Aife was the last sniper and the greatest treasure left behind by the Syndicute. She must be rescued for the sake of the humanity's future.

Name: Unveiling the Golden Veil
Desc: Hidden in the darkness before Dawn, Gray Raven traveled through sandstorms and entered the unpopulated desert named "Golden Vortex".

Name: Mystery of the Light Pillar
Desc: In the center of Golden Vortex was a group of buildings shrouded in the "Golden Pillar". Its origin was still unknown to Gray Raven.

Name: Value of Existence
Desc: Yesterday at noon time, Goldfinch changed their mission objective and started heading toward the center of Golden Vortex.

Name: Contribution
Desc: As the night started to fall, Goldfinch members seemed to have foreseen their upcoming fate...

Name: Lone Raven
Desc: After the communication with Liv was cut, Lee left to search for her. Lucia stayed back with the commandant.

Name: Royal Guards
Desc: The queen's royal guards chased after Lucia and the commandant. They had to run for almost an hour...

Name: Red Light, Green Light
Desc: Minutes after Lee left, he was trapped among a group of guards with peculiar behaviors...

Name: Big Gamble
Desc: Lee fought a tough battle in the underground secret passage. The guards wanted to trap him to death...

Name: Letter of Invitation
Desc: When Lucia was trapped in a tough fight, the mysterious queen sent her royal guards to invite the commandant to her palace.

Name: Queen's Arrival
Desc: It was nearly noon, the sun was hanging high in the sky and scorching the Golden Vortex. The "Golden Queen" finally revealed herself...

Name: Digging Site
Desc: Browning finally found the device after searching in the desert for almost 40 minutes. But it was covered under some golden powder...

Name: Aftermath
Desc: After more than 10 minutes of digging, the device was almost out. But Browning triggered a landmine underneath it...

Name: Cheap Shot
Desc: Liv returned to her Construct after 5 minutes of hacking into the system. But Browning...

Name: Explosive Encounter
Desc: Liv seized the opportunity for a "mutual destruction" with Browning...

Name: Maverick
Desc: Watanabe reached the Golden Vortex in the morning. The enemy info was still unknown, but he charged in alone.

Name: Saving the Earth
Desc: After sending Liv away, Bianca searched in the sand for half an hour because she had figured out Babylonia's real intention...

Name: Old Habit
Desc: It didn't take long before Watanabe was forced to reveal himself...

Name: Choice
Desc: Watanabe's rescue plan faced challenge immediately after he got away from Bianca...

Name: Relic
Desc: After leaving the weather engine, Watanabe found a pendant of the Forsaken from a guard...

Name: Queen's Treat
Desc: Golden Queen revealed her true form to Gray Raven. Meanwhile, Bianca had explored Golden Vortex for hours, but the sample analysis still hadn't succeeded...

Name: Queen's Request
Desc: Golden Queen announced her requests to the commandant and Babylonia in her palace.

Name: Promise
Desc: Watanabe and Bianca fought for almost 10 minutes, but neither was going to win. The guards took the opportunity and laid siege on them...

Name: Off Form
Desc: Kamui and Roland fought all the way to the northwest of Golden Vortex, when Kamui discovered some anomaly in Roland's Construct...

Name: Promise Keeper
Desc: It took Watanabe an hour to make sure all Forsaken had safely evacuated. Some tried to persuade him not to return and help Bianca...

Name: Hostage
Desc: After defeating the "Silent Guards", Bianca followed the strange noise into a secret chamber with humans locked up in it...

Name: Two Ways of Rescue
Desc: Bianca defeated the warden and freed all the hostages. Bianca stopped her as he wanted to take his own men.

Name: Golden Antibody
Desc: Despite letting the hostage go, Bianca still took the Golden Antibody... But the royal guards suddenly attacked her!

Name: Negotiation
Desc: After confronting each other for many more minutes, Kamui almost made Roland devastated...

Name: For Commandant
Desc: Bianca fought alongside the Forsaken to defeat the royal guards. Once again, she faced different choices...

Name: Follower
Desc: Karenina sneaked into the Golden Vortex from the south. But she didn't know she was being followed...

Name: Human Experiment
Desc: Nanami joined Karenina to defeat the guards of the main building together, but she disappeared within 5 minutes...

Name: Starting Again
Desc: The communication was restored for minutes and Karenina completed her mission with flying colors. It's up to her where she wants to go now.

Name: Resistance
Desc: Blasting through dozens of walls, Karenina decided to explore Golden Vortex in her own way...

Name: Merge
Desc: Nanami returned, but she brought bad news about Roland the Ascendant...

Name: Vision
Desc: Nanami's hacking only took a few minutes. She failed to trace Roland in the internal network, but she found out that Nithart took the commandant of Gray Raven...

Name: Tracking the Sound
Desc: After defeating golden guards and royal guards, they were only one door away from the commandant...

Name: Deterrence
Desc: Under Roland's order, the Corrupted managed to stall Kamui for over 2 hours, only to make him fight even harder...

Name: Hospitality
Desc: After getting rid of Kamui, Roland carefully assessed the threat of Golden Antibody...

Name: Seeking Help
Desc: Captured by Nithart, Roland was unfortunately covered in the antibody and suffered for 90 minutes...

Name: Communication Disorder
Desc: After leaving Karenina, Nanami finally found the thing that caught her attention.

Name: Blockage
Desc: Roland spent an hour calling for help, but the reinforcement didn't arrive as expected.

Name: Mutual Destruction
Desc: Due to the antibody, Roland was completely overwhelmed by Nanami. He had to use more extreme methods to save himself.

Name: Annihilation
Desc: As the building collapsed, Roland fell into the ruins. He had a chance to prove himself again...

Name: Hound or Eagle
Desc: Soldiers of Babylonia gathered for the first time in the afternoon. The truth of Golden Antibody was soon announced...

Name: Unity
Desc: The queen's royal guards all appeared. Gray Raven's evacuation plan was interrupted once again.

Name: Total Alert
Desc: An hour into the ambush against Gray Raven, Golden Queen once again destroyed the Constructs' formation...

Name: Prelude of Pandemic
Desc: As the power system of Golden Vortex crashed, Babylonia's remote communication was restored. Gray Raven managed to contact Hassen...

Name: Expansion
Desc: Minutes into the trap, Karenina discovered the secret to the expanding numbers of golden guards...

Name: Bet
Desc: Far away in the space, an emergency meeting was taking place in Babylonia's ship...

Name: Dynasty
Desc: Gray Raven successfully held off the royal guards. Infuriated, Golden Queen exposed her biggest weakness...

Name: Master Gamer
Desc: Kamui was too powerful to be contained. Golden Queen had to separate him from the others...

Name: Exit
Desc: After successfully contaminating the power system, Roland left the Golden Vortex with his damaged Construct...

Name: Collapse
Desc: Unable to stop her loss, the Golden Queen's frame broke down. Golden Vortex collapsed, and so did her "dynasty"...

Name: Source of Disaster
Desc: Before sunset, Punishing Virus converted countless defeated guards into Corrupted. They were "reborn" from the Golden Vortex's ruins...

Desc: Information saved

Desc: Information saved

Desc: Information saved

Desc: Information saved

Desc: Information saved

Name: Bunker Dune
Desc: Information saved

Desc: Information saved

Name: Data Center
Desc: Information saved

Name: Ghost Coast
Desc: Information saved

Name: Quick Reaction Passage
Desc: Information saved

Name: Radar Station
Desc: Information saved

Name: HelloWorld
Desc: The Start of Summer Time

Name: Summer Beach Fun
Desc: An aqua ocean, soft sand, and little surprises.

Name: Chat about the Future
Desc: The Gray Ravens have settled down and started enjoying themselves on the beach...

Name: Cat and Mouse - Fake
Desc: Rats are just a bunch of tiny creatures, but at least they can entertain you...

Name: Transcendant
Desc: Kamui woke up, but he looked like another person entirely...

Name: Uncontrolled Reality
Desc: Things seemed to have gone beyond your control now...

Name: Into the Abyss
Desc: Enter the unknown realm.

Name: Searing
Desc: Hot day, hot blood.

Name: It's Gonna Work
Desc: When you are not sure what a button or switch does, you have to rely on your intuition.

Name: System Warnings
Desc: Illegal operation detected.

Name: Ant Venom
Desc: The pain boiling in the heart.

Name: Scientific Solutions
Desc: Bomb the best!

Name: Dead End
Desc: Cannot be caught by that guy, not now.

Name: Countdown
Desc: I'll be waiting there.

Name: Bloody Confession
Desc: You're dying here, today.

Name: M.A.D
Desc: When will you understand that they're nothing but enemies?

Name: The End of Childhood
Desc: Everyone dies, and so does our childhood.

Name: Rose Stem
Desc: It might have thorns. It might also secretly want you to hold it.

Name: Your Life Story
Desc: After a series of dreadful events, your summer finally began.

Name: The Necessary Black Sheep
Desc: That's right, we haven't forgotten you.

Name: Shome
Desc: The sound of anxious back-and-forth pacing fills the research room, deep in the facility.

Name: Crushed Bones
Desc: Covet that which shan't be coveted, and be prepared to go through fire and water.

Name: The Forgotten Land
Desc: Wind blows over the vast desert, sweeping up sand and dust into a storm.

Name: Venus Splash Park
Desc: At the moment of its completion, time became frozen on this enchanted isle. The observation platform, dreamily hanging in the sky, looks almost like a border between fantasy and reality.

Name: Game Starts
Desc: Everything will end here, through a spectacular finale.

Name: Ascension-Network
Desc: Hmph, and what have you discovered? —Huff... The essence of... the Ascension-Network.

Name: Suspicions
Desc: I keep thinking she seems a little weird today.

Name: A Trivial Moment
Desc: The sound of footsteps come from the end of the walkway, adding from liveliness to the sluggish street.

Name: Different Plans
Desc: Liv seemed to be troubled by something lately. After some discussion, Lucia explained everything...

Name: Mysterious Helper
Desc: To prepare a secret Christmas celebration for Liv, other Gray Raven members and the commandant started to take action. They also met a great helper.

Name: Operation Begins
Desc: Information saved

Name: Lumberjack
Desc: Information saved

Name: Super Christmas Tree
Desc: Nanami brought back a Christmas tree, but Lucia and Lee were puzzled by the choice of decorations.

Name: Operation Christmas
Desc: Liv also ended up joining the preparation. Everyone was working full on for the final stage before the Christmas celebration.

Name: Lone Wolf
Desc: Information saved

Name: Fireworks and Presents
Desc: Thanks to Karenina, the fireworks were lit up. When the folks gathered outside to watch the fireworks show, snowflakes started to fall.

Name: Merry Christmas!
Desc: In the end, everyone decided to take a group photo to celebrate Gray Raven and other Constructs' first ever Christmas.

Name: Narwhal
Desc: Information saved

Name: Returning to the Surface
Desc: Gray Raven was attacked on the way to the surface...

Name: Forest Guard
Desc: Gray Raven had an emergency landing in the snow ruins and encountered a local force.

Name: Aurora
Desc: Information saved

Name: Watch From Afar
Desc: Information saved

Name: Blade to Blade
Desc: Information saved

Name: Stubbornness & Courage
Desc: The locals were surprisingly stubborn and brave, even against a formidable enemy.

Name: Reasons to Fight
Desc: Information saved

Name: Tide of Machines
Desc: The Corrupted from deep sea swarmed the Murmansk Port!

Name: Chaos
Desc: Information saved

Name: Reunion
Desc: Information saved

Name: Failed Work
Desc: Information saved

Name: Direction of Hope
Desc: Narwhal Derek saved a seed of hope for Rosetta. What would happen to her in future...?

Name: Snowmark
Desc: Information saved

Name: Sub-Zero Guardian
Desc: Information saved

Name: Stars and Sands
Desc: After the battle ended, Babylonia forged an alliance with Akdilek. As the Gray Raven hadn't left the train, they received an order to assist the train repair works.

Name: Chaotic Carriages
Desc: Before getting to the next check point, Gray Ravens had to pass a commoners' carriage corrupted by the Heterozygote. Meanwhile, someone caught up with them...

Name: Baby Dream
Desc: Gray Ravens arrived at the central stronghold, the industrial carriage. Lee would team up with the repairers to face the dangers in this carriage.

Name: Endless Tunnel
Desc: Sophia informed Gray Ravens out of the blue that a substantial malfunction forced the train to stop in an emergency...

Name: Gronin Station
Desc: The repair works nearly came to an end. It was time to farewell this train at this nostalgic place.

Name: Sleeping Beauty
Desc: Are you clear about the rules, my "Sleeping Beauty"?

Name: Little Red Cap
Desc: All good now. Commandant, why are you using remote communication... Do you mind explaining?

Name: Two Musketeers
Desc: And I am Lee... We are like two musketeers now.

Name: Ali Baba
Desc: Is this another trick that Lord is playing on me?

Name: The Three Little Pigs
Desc: Let us show you the power of the trio!

Name: Puss in Boots
Desc: ...What a terrible joke.

Name: Pinocchio
Desc: You are a pervert, aren't you?!

Name: Daughter of the Ocean
Desc: These are the guidelines on Connection Chambers.

Name: The Prince
Desc: It doesn't matter what Commandant sees in me, because I only have one thing to do, right from the beginning.

Name: Happy April Fools' Day!
Desc: It's great when everyone comes together, Commandant. I wish we can spend every year, every month, and every holiday like this.

Name: Sky Lord Celica
Desc: The world fell into darkness, and I became the Lord of the Skies.

Name: Sands of Infinity
Desc: Information saved

Desc: Information saved

Desc: Information saved

Name: Prepare for Winter
Desc: A secret conversation after a chaotic war.

Name: Statue
Desc: After seizing Huaxu, the Ascendants were preparing for another operation.

Name: Midnight Sale
Desc: There is nothing more expensive than something free... Isn't it?

Name: The Forsaken and The Festival
Desc: This could be the only day worth looking forward to.

Name: Replacement & Determination
Desc: There are two types of things in this world: those can be replaced, and those cannot.

Name: Resolution
Desc: Today is a festival. No one misses out.

Name: Hometown & "Zongzi"
Desc: This is...the best zongzi in the world.

Name: Journey & Future
Desc: The journey has come to an end, but the festival continues.

Name: Festival & "War"
Desc: This is a war of pride!

Name: Summer Afternoon
Desc: It was a faded, old box. On its cover was a sunny holiday beach.

Name: Virtual Swimsuit
Desc: These are all swimsuits, aren't they?

Name: Truth or Dare
Desc: Can't enjoy the beach without a truth or dare game!

Name: War on Beach
Desc: Running on the beach "battlefield" with "combat" suits.

Name: The "Surprise"
Desc: I'm already enjoying myself playing games with you all!

Name: A Brief Holiday
Desc: Let's enjoy the holiday a little longer.

Name: Special Gift
Desc: An unexpected present.
